reviewDescription: Sensodyne Repair and Protect is one of the only toothpastes to include an unique ingredient called Novamin. Novamin is one of the biggest breakthroughs in dental health since the introduction of fluoride. This ingredient contains the molecules found naturally in human saliva which combine to rebuild and repair enamel. Novamin is simply a combination of silica, calcium, phosphorus, and sodium, but combined in a way so that they won't react until exposed to water/saliva during brushing.Toothpastes that just contain fluoride simply remove plaque through mechanical brushing, then deposit fluoride on the tooth's surface. After brushing, the saliva will then mix with the fluoride and create a stronger barrier against acid's compared to the barrier which would have formed from saliva alone which is more vulnerable to acids from the foods we eat and the byproducts of bacteria.The whole point of this toothpaste is to combine the fluoride and important reparative ingredients found in saliva into one, that way this reparative process can start to take place immediately, and even people with dry mouth syndrome or other tooth disorders can benefit. On top of this it also is one of the best defences against teeth sensitivity as it seals exposed dentin. Novamin can also help whiten teeth over time.For the past few years this toothpaste has been available in Europe, however with the US release, they have completely omitted this new novamin technology! This toothpaste is like all the others. It is just a fluoride toothpaste, which is still good, but definitely not worth the high price. The Canadian version of this toothpaste like the EU version has the novamin tech, but sadly the US version does not.Also, the type of fluoride that is included in this toothpaste (Stannous Fluoride) may cause stains to form. I've started taking a multivitamin to eliminate the possibility of a vitamin deficiency. I've been embarrassed for weeks, trying my best to hide my lips, yet not affect them further with cover-up. As I was thinking about what change could I have possibly instated within the past few months that could have caused this reaction, I remembered I had recently switched from a competitor brand to Sensodyne. So I stopped using Sensodyne Repair & Protect Whitening over a week ago, and my lips have FINALLY returned to normal! I can't believe it! Never again will I use this product. However, my competitor brand toothpaste contains SLS, too, and does not have the same affect on my lips and skin. reviewDescription: We live in a society where hygiene is a key factor in success and having good health. Nowadays there are a multitude of toothpastes and when it comes to the health of your mouth and teeth, choosing the correct toothpaste should never be overlooked. When it came to purchasing toothpaste, I always found myself purchasing products that said, “pure white” or “ultra-white teeth.” I was always focused on making my teeth white and shiny and found myself not caring what was inside the toothpaste or what it was doing to my teeth. Unfortunately, this past year I had developed problems with sensitivity and soreness in my teeth and gums. I decided to consult with my dentist to see why this was occurring. In doing so, my dentist had informed me that I was experiencing decay to my enamel. My dentist had advised me to use Sensodyne toothpaste. With this being said, I was a little iffy about purchasing Sensodyne because I thought I would lose having white shiny teeth. However, I decided to do more research about Sensodyne and see if this product was worth trying.In my research I found that the company Sensodyne uses large appeals of rhetoric in hopes of persuading people like me to purchase their product. They utilize credibility by expressing that “Sensodyne is the #1 dentist recommended brand for sensitive teeth” (Sensodyne). This statement indicates that dentists support the claim that Sensodyne is a healthy sensitive reducing toothpaste. In addition, they incorporate statistical facts, such as labels and ingredients that they use in the product. One main ingredient used in the toothpaste is fluoride, “which helps fight against cavities, so you can maintain healthy teeth every day” (Sensodyne). Furthermore, they use pathos to draw in the consumers; for example, they constantly state: “With twice daily brushing” (Sensodyne), which can be indicated that if you do not brush your teeth daily the product might not be as successful. Therefore, the use of this emotion is to address the audience that you should be brushing your teeth twice a day. Moreover, Sensodyne conveys the message that they are a global company that dedicates science and research to “help people do more, feel better, and live longer” (Wadia).After further examination, I decided to evaluate the comments from other consumer reviews. During this, I found that the main cons to this product was its price and the small tube sizes. It can be seen that the toothpaste ranges from $10.00 to $12.00 and has an average tube size of 3.4 ounces. The negative of this, is that consumers are having to often purchase more toothpaste due to the lack of quantity that the size of the paste provides. Other than that, the toothpaste expresses significant pros to the product. For example, Sensodyne relieves sensitivity, prevents cavities, helps with bad breath, and keeps teeth white and clean.Overall, after doing my research I found that I was successfully persuaded to purchase and try out this product. It has been two months now and my teeth and gums are no longer sore or as sensitive as they were. The product started to relieve the pain after a few days of using the toothpaste and even though it is designed for sensitive teeth, I continue to use it daily. In addition, my mouth feels healthy and very clean. Plus, my teeth are as white or even whiter than the toothpastes that specifically state: “pure” or “ultra-white teeth.” Even though the cons of this product have an effect on one from purchasing this toothpaste, the pros most certainly outweigh the negatives. I feel that other reviews are accurate to the point of how well this product works on teeth. All inclusive, I highly recommend this product to others who are in search of not just curing sensitive teeth, but also are looking for cleaner healthier white teeth!
